width='754px' xmlns:xlink='http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' zoomAndPan='magnify'><defs><filter height='1' id='bl2ji10zqnu9x0' width='1' x='0' y='0'><feFlood flood-color='#FFA500' result='flood'/><feComposite in='SourceGraphic' in2='flood' operator='over'/></filter></defs><g><rect fill='#F1F1F1' height='36.2969' rx='12.5' ry='12.5' style='stroke:#181818;stroke-width:1.5;' width='154' x='325' y='323.8672'/><text fill='#000000' font-family='sans-serif' font-size='14' lengthAdjust='spacing' textLength='134' x='335' y='346.8623'>Creole on Mindmap</text><rect fill='#F1F1F1' height='270.4844' rx='12.5' ry='12.5' style='stroke:#181818;stroke-width:1.5;' width='213' x='529' y='66.5313'/><text fill='#000000' font-family='sans-serif' font-size='16' font-weight='bold' lengthAdjust='spacing' textLength='93' x='539' y='91.3828'>Creole line</text><text fill='#000000' font-family='sans-serif' font-size='14' lengthAdjust='spacing' textLength='193' x='539' y='108.1514'>You can have horizontal line</text><line style='stroke:#181818;stroke-width:1.0;' x1='529' x2='742' y1='116.4531' y2='116.4531'/><text fill='#000000' font-family='sans-serif' font-size='14' lengthAdjust='spacing' textLength='96' x='539' y='134.4482'>Or double line</text><line style='stroke:#181818;stroke-width:1.0;' x1='529' x2='742' y1='142.75' y2='142.75'/><line style='stroke:#181818;stroke-width:1.0;' x1='529' x2='742' y1='144.75' y2='144.75'/><text fill='#000000' font-family='sans-serif' font-size='14' lengthAdjust='spacing' textLength='93' x='539' y='160.7451'>Or strong line</text><text fill='#000000' font-family='sans-serif' font-size='14' lengthAdjust='spacing' textLength='28' x='539' y='177.042'>____</text><text fill='#000000' font-family='sans-serif' font-size='14' lengthAdjust='spacing' textLength='94' x='539' y='193.3389'>Or dotted line</text><line style='stroke:#181818;stroke-width:1.0;stroke-dasharray:1.0,2.0;' x1='529' x2='611.5' y1='204.7891' y2='204.7891'/><text fill='#000000' font-family='sans-serif' font-size='14' lengthAdjust='spacing' textLength='48' x='611.5' y='209.1357'>My title</text><line style='stroke:#181818;stroke-width:1.0;stroke-dasharray:1.0,2.0;' x1='659.5' x2='742' y1='204.7891' y2='204.7891'/><text fill='#000000' font-family='sans-serif' font-size='14' lengthAdjust='spacing' textLength='95' x='539' y='225.9326'>Or dotted title</text><text fill='#000000' font-family='sans-serif' font-size='14' font-style='italic' lengthAdjust='spacing' textLength='67' x='539' y='242.2295'>and title...</text><line style='stroke:#181818;stroke-width:1.0;' x1='529' x2='621' y1='253.6797' y2='253.6797'/><line y='258.0264'>Title</text><line style='stroke:#181818;stroke-width:1.0;' x1='650' x2='742' y1='253.6797' y2='253.6797'/><line style='stroke:#181818;stroke-width:1.0;' x1='650' x2='742' y1='255.6797' y2='255.6797'/><text fill='#000000' font-family='sans-serif' font-size='14' lengthAdjust='spacing' textLength='126' x='539' y='274.8232'>Or double-line title</text><line y='77.917'>italics</text><text fill='#000000' font-family='sans-serif' font-size='14' lengthAdjust='spacing' textLength='44' x='28' y='94.2139'>This is</text><text fill='#000000'
